title: Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
description: Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work. Description: Color orange doesn't work.Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When previewing the color selection, the orange color does not appear.
EB: The orange color should appear when selected.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the color selection menu. 
2. Choose the orange color. 
3. Preview the selected color.
